Text: Thanks for the upload!  I was collecting when New Universe was originally released and picked up a couple of series once they hit the 50 cent boxes.  Most of them are pretty average at best, but the Jim Shooter issues of Starbrand are actually pretty good, as I remember.  If you're looking for a place to start, that's the series I'd recommend.
Good job! This was gonna be my next upload but glad to see it's handled. Now I can get into obscure stuff!
